channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Oozie
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Oozie

item.title: CVE-2020-35451|2024-08-04T17:02:08.135Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20oozie
item.description: There is a race condition in OozieSharelibCLI in Apache Oozie before version 5.2.1 which allows a malicious attacker to replace the files in Oozie's sharelib during it's creation.
